definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
lit. a full bottle makes no sound; a half-filled bottle sloshes (idiom)/fig. empty vessels make the most noise
pinyin: yi1 ping2 zi5 bu4 xiang3 , ban4 ping2 zi5 huang4 dang5
containing_words.word: 一瓶子不響，半瓶子晃蕩

definition: lit. a full bottle makes no sound; a half-filled bottle sloshes (idiom)/fig. empty vessels make the most noise
pinyin: yi1 ping2 zi5 bu4 xiang3 , ban4 ping2 zi5 huang4 dang5
containing_words.word: 一瓶子不響，半瓶子晃蕩

sentences.english: The bottle had a skull and crossbones symbol on it.
sentences.chinese: 瓶子上有骷髏和交叉的股骨圖形。

sentences.english: First we got a bottle hooked to a key-chain.
sentences.chinese: 我們用鑰匙鏈和瓶子串在一起。

sentences.english: She answers the man’s question, then brings the bottle up and takes a drink.
sentences.chinese: 她回答了那個人的問題，然後仰起瓶子，喝了一口水。

sentences.english: And beyond that, swap them for White Jars when you're doing Light Crystal recipes.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，他們掉白水晶瓶子當你做輕食譜。

sentences.english: Leave that bottle alone; there is oil in it.
sentences.chinese: 別碰那個瓶子，裏面有油。

sentences.english: Houlihan says 25 percent of bottled waters are simply "tap water in a bottle."
sentences.chinese: 胡莉說，25%的瓶裝水就是裝在瓶子裏的自來水。

sentences.english: Satan pocketed a bottle and shuffled toward the car.
sentences.chinese: 撒旦將一隻瓶子揣進口袋，拖着雙腳走向車子。

sentences.english: There were some bottles and a few well-read books.
sentences.chinese: 裏面有幾隻瓶子，還有幾本經常讀的書籍。

sentences.english: The performer shows a picture of a wine bottle and a glass.
sentences.chinese: 表演者表示酒瓶子的一張照片和玻璃。

sentences.english: Rubbish collectors are following behind the procession picking up discarded bottles, bound to be making a big fortune today.
sentences.chinese: 撿廢氣瓶子的拾荒者跟在隊伍後面，他們也收穫頗豐。

sentences.english: He used a funnel to fill the bottle with oil.
sentences.chinese: 他用漏斗往瓶子裏灌油。

sentences.english: The shelves are half empty, and the bottles of cleaning fluidare covered with dust.
sentences.chinese: 店裏的架子一半都空了，裝清洗液的瓶子落滿了灰塵。

sentences.english: Do you think I should take this clock or the pair of bottles？
sentences.chinese: 你想我是買個座鐘還是買這對瓶子？

sentences.english: The champagne is spilling out of the bottle.
sentences.chinese: 香檳從瓶子中不斷地溢出來。

sentences.english: The streets were littered with stones and bottles hurled at the soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 街道上到處撒落着砸向士兵的石頭和瓶子。

sentences.english: The Water-bearer is far too cool and detached for you.
sentences.chinese: 瓶子對你太冷淡，常想與你分開。
